Who I am

My name is Josh Martin and I am a former northwestern Pennsylvanian, now based in Chicago, working as Creative Director for Threadmeup / JoshDeux for TeamJosh.

Previously, Chicago Sun-Times

What I Do

I work primarily in UI/UX and front-end development. I layout the architecture of websites and apps via sitemaps and wireframes, then create their interface through mockups, prototyping, and ultimately, HTML/CSS/JS.

In addition to design, I also spend a significant amount of time in branding and illustration.

My Experience

E-commerce, data visualization, and large-scale digital news media. I have helped shape multiplatform products all across the United States, as well as in the Caribbean and Ireland.

For more details on my past job experience and various professional proficiencies, please see my Linkedin.

My Work

You can find my latest on Dribbble and detailed write-ups of past projects on Behance.

Connect

The usual suspects: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Email
